pageProps.title: spacy-huggingface-hub
pageProps.teaser: Push your spaCy pipelines to the Hugging Face Hub

data.title: spacy-huggingface-hub
data.slogan: Push your spaCy pipelines to the Hugging Face Hub
data.description: This package provides a CLI command for uploading any trained spaCy pipeline packaged with [`spacy package`](https://spacy.io/api/cli#package) to the [Hugging Face Hub](https://huggingface.co). It auto-generates all meta information for you, uploads a pretty README (requires spaCy v3.1+) and handles version control under the hood.
data.author: Explosion
